item.description:
JazzCorner.com is proud to be the online sponsor for the:
2010 New Haven Jazz Festival Line-Up
Presented by Jazz Haven in collaboration with Casey Family Services & Department of Cultural Affairs

August 14 & 21, 2010

New Haven Green, New Haven, CT

Saturday, August 14, 2010 ~ 3-9pm

Neighborhood Youth Jazz Orchestra - 3:00pm
Noah Baerman Jazz Suite “Know Thyself” Septet featuring Wayne Escoffrey - 4:00pm
Afro-Peruvian Jazz Showcase - 5:15pm
Winard Harper Sextet - 6:30pm
Bobby Watson Quartet - 7:45pm


Pop in and enjoy a day of Jazz, bring a picnic and a bottle of wine and enjoy some smooth sounds of Jazz. I will be there all day so you can come and go as you please. Spend the day in New Haven. and the evening under the star's listening to some wonderful Jazz.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: New Haven "Jazz Festival"
